Room.Name: Bythme's Bedroom
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Bythme's private bedroom.
Room.LongDescription: As you entered the room, several small and naked female goblins were startled by your presence and fled out the door. An unmade bed takes up most of the room, and piles of clothing and goblin religous objects seem to take up the rest of the it. Regardless of how powerful the high priest Bythme is, his housekeeping skills are not good. he seems to like very young females, too, although he is one of the oldest goblins alive.
